personalInfo.name: Your Name
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 5+ years building scalable web applications. Passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems and mentoring junior developers. Specialized in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud architecture.

experience.description: Lead development of customer-facing web applications serving 1M+ users
achievements: Architected and implemented new feature that increased user engagement by 40%
Led team of 4 engineers in migrating legacy system to modern React/TypeScript stack
Reduced page load time by 60% through optimization efforts and code splitting
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted regular code reviews

experience.description: Built and maintained multiple client projects from concept to deployment
achievements: Developed 5 production applications using React, Vue, and Angular
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 75%
Created reusable component library used across 10+ projects
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect responsive interfaces

experience.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications for diverse clients
achievements: Built 15+ client websites with 100% on-time delivery
Improved site performance scores to 95+ on Google Lighthouse
Implemented accessibility standards achieving WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
Trained team members on modern JavaScript and React best practices

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
